price: उनकी साँस चढ़ी होगी (तेज़ साँसें निकलेंगी) तथा वे उसमें (कुछ) नहीं सुन सकेंगे।
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
